root: ^Rhodes: Boots and cats and boots and cats and boots...
^Rhodes: La dee daa la dee da...
^Rhodes: Dum dum dee dum dum dum dee da dum...

BadBeats: ^Jacky: Not really what I was looking for, but it was a good attempt.
JackyIntro: ^Rhodes: That’s cool! Have you done any shows recently?
^Rhodes: That’s nice, are you dying soon?
^Rhodes: Wait, so do you play music while you drive?
BusDriver: ^Jacky: No, I’m just driving the bus.
^Jacky: I get to open for the show!!!
^Jacky: Well... when we find a bus.
^Rhodes: Is that how they’re paying you?
^Rhodes: That seems a little backwards. Shouldn’t you have the bus before being hired as a driver?
^Rhodes: Wow, they really do take anyone.
^Rhodes: Must be nice getting free concerts.
GuessSo: ^Jacky: Apparently we’re behind schedule because the manager keeps scaring people off.
^Jacky: But I want people to hear my beats, so I figured I’d stick around and find a bus.
^Jacky: Aren’t all jobs paying in free exposure nowadays?
PayingYou: ^Rhodes: Well, I hope you find that bus.
^Rhodes: Guess that’s one way to get paid.
